last_episode_to_air.name: Song of Sigrid
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the reign of the gods hanging in the balance, legends rise, heroes fall and hidden motives come to light. Odin experiences a shocking revelation.

name: Twilight of the Gods
overview: Zack Snyder unleashes a bold and bloody vision of Norse mythology in this adult animated series about a warrior with an ax to grind against the gods.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In a mythical world of great battles, great deeds and great despair, Leif, a mortal King, is saved on the battlefield by Sigrid, an iron-willed warrior with whom he falls in love. On their wedding night, Sigrid and Leif survive a wrath of terror from Thor, which sets them - and a crew of crusaders - on an against all odds and merciless mission for vengeance. This heroic story of love, loss and revenge, is a journey to Hell and beyond… across fantastical lands, battlefields fierce and bloody, and wars waged against Gods and demons.

episodes.name: The Bride-Price
episodes.overview: The wedding of Sigrid and King Leif ends in tragedy when Thor unleashes his wrath upon the ceremony, sparking a vow of vengeance from the bride-to-be.

episodes.name: Heretic Spear
episodes.overview: In the underworld, Loki sets a plan in motion. Sigrid and Leif recruit a band of warriors and launch a quest for weapons made of god-killing iron.

episodes.name: You Will Gladden His Ravens
episodes.overview: Odin's huntsmen attack Sigrid's crusaders on their treacherous journey to Vanaheim. Thor and his mortal enemy come face to face in combat.

episodes.name: The Worm
episodes.overview: To obtain a bushel of enchanted apples for the Vanir gods, the warriors must bloody their swords in a fight against the beast guarding the orchard.

episodes.name: The Scapegoat God
episodes.overview: Leif and Loki find themselves trapped in a cursed realm. A pack of First Wolves aids the warriors. Sigrid's story attracts surprising new allies.

episodes.name: Now Hear Of...
episodes.overview: On the eve of war, Sigrid and her companions share fantastic tales of magic and honor. Passions ignite around camp, and Odin issues a dire warning.

episodes.name: If I Had a Hammer
episodes.overview: The epic battle begins as mortals, giants and Vanir deities clash swords with Thor and his Aesir soldiers. A risky secret mission ends in bloodshed.

episodes.name: Song of Sigrid
episodes.overview: With the reign of the gods hanging in the balance, legends rise, heroes fall and hidden motives come to light. Odin experiences a shocking revelation.
